definitions: used to express uncertainty or possibility

examples.text: perhaps I should have been frank with him

shortDefinitions: used to express uncertainty or possibility

definitions: used when one does not wish to be too definite or assertive in the expression of an opinion

examples.text: perhaps not surprisingly, he was cautious about committing himself

shortDefinitions: used when one does not wish to be too definite or assertive in expression of opinion

definitions: used when making a polite request, offer, or suggestion

examples.text: would you perhaps consent to act as our guide?

shortDefinitions: used when making polite request or suggestion
